link.title: Port Clinton City School District: News and Announcements

div.aria-label: Board Meeting Schedule During COVID-19 Shutdown News Post
div.h3: Board Meeting Schedule During COVID-19 Shutdown
div.span: Port Clinton Board of Education meetings will be held virtually during the COVID-19 stay at home order. Live feeds of the meetings can be found at the district's facebook page facebook.com/portclintonschoools. To see the schedule of upcoming board meetings click HERE​​​​​​​

div.div:
811 S. Jefferson St.
Port Clinton, OH 43452
